description: Resilience and Success in College is a six-week elective module for students that teaches basic concepts of positive psychology and engages students in self-reflection and discussions to better manage stress and overcome adversity. Discover what it means to find purpose in your work, how to use strengths to your advantage, and the importance of fostering positive interpersonal relationships to improve mental, emotional, and physical well-being.
title: Resilience and Success In College
